08:54 <teekay> has joined #xwiki  
08:55 <teekay> Hi guys, I was wondering if issue XWIKI-9006 is known to pop back up again? I seem to have schema's in my postgres database after I delete wiki's and I'm on 5.4.4  
08:57 <teekay> sorry my mistake, the search function still thinks these schema's exist and try to return documents from deleted wiki's

12:20 <xwikiorg\_guest\_3> Hi all, if I have a groovy class to render a document (getRenderedContent), what's the way to set variables for the rendering? E.g the page to get the content for contains ${name} and the groovy script should set it before rendering  
12:26 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
12:31 <Denis> has quit  
12:34 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
12:45 <Denis> has quit  
12:47 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
12:54 <ClemensR> what I can think of is using xcontext.put("name", value) before rendering and then use  $xcontext.get("name) instead of ${name} ... assuming it is in a velocity macro in the content of the document. Have not tried of it works, though

16:20 <gdelhumeau> any idea?
